com.jgoodies.plaf.windows
Class ExtWindowsOptionPaneUI

java.lang.Object
  javax.swing.plaf.ComponentUI
      javax.swing.plaf.OptionPaneUI
          javax.swing.plaf.basic.BasicOptionPaneUI
              com.jgoodies.plaf.windows.ExtWindowsOptionPaneUI
public final class ExtWindowsOptionPaneUI
extends javax.swing.plaf.basic.BasicOptionPaneUI

The JGoodies Windows Look&Feel implementation of OptionPaneUI. Honors the screen resolution and uses a minimum button with that complies better with the Windows UI style guide.

Author:
Karsten Lentzsch
